poem:
"An Ocean of Hope"

The hopeful vessel,
on the edge of the horizon,
ready to break the silence
of this enduring night.

Sweet cargo of charity humming,
laden beneath the Mediterranean sky.
Beirut, Tel Aviv, Gaza watch,
their heartbeats echoing over the sea.

In these quiet moments,
water lapping against hope,
a promise stirs,
it carries more than aid,
it carries the world's gentle sigh
toward a dawning peace.
